block.p: COHEN-Seymour (Sy). On June 17, 2000. Beloved husband of Peggy Ann (nee Caspers). Devoted father of Susan, Carolyn and Lori, and father-in-law of Rob Maccabee and Paul Strauss. Cherished Poppop of Josh, Daniel and Emily. Dear brother of Audrey. Co-founder of Leslie Ann Fashions. Dearest friend and partner of Sal Vitale. Visiting Sunday, 7-9 PM. Service Monday, 11:15 AM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave.
